basics.name: Afghan Eka Pangestu
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A fresh graduate in Informatics Engineering from Indraprasta University, with experience in the Certified Independent Study and Internship Program (MSIB) Batch 6. Skilled in using Vue.js 2, MongoDB, and Vuetify, with experience in working on web and API projects for academic and freelance purposes. Currently seeking new challenges to continue growing, expanding networks, and gaining experience.

work.name: PT BTPN Syariah Tbk
work.summary: Developed a router application for creating dashboard lists and log monitoring using Springboot Framework and Vue JS 2. Assisted the product owner in organizing documents about user feedback surveys.
highlights: Developed router application using Springboot Framework and Vue JS 2
Created dashboard lists and log monitoring features
Assisted in organizing user feedback survey documents
responsibilities: Developed router application for dashboard lists and log monitoring
Used Springboot Framework and Vue JS 2 for development
Assisted product owner with document organization
achievements: Successfully implemented router application with dashboard and monitoring features

work.name: PT Ciptanusa Nuansa Mulia
work.summary: Developed a project management application using Laravel to calculate projects, RAB, manage vendors, and various other aspects, improving efficiency and accuracy in project management.
highlights: Developed project management application using Laravel
Implemented features for project calculation, RAB, and vendor management
responsibilities: Improved efficiency and accuracy in project management
achievements: Successfully delivered a comprehensive project management solution

work.name: PT Bintang Bahagia Selalu - Royal Star
work.summary: Assisted in improving the user interface on the front page with enhancements to the slider, video, navigation menu, and WhatsApp button. Improved overall user experience and visual appearance.
highlights: Enhanced slider, video, navigation menu, and WhatsApp button
responsibilities: Optimized visual appearance of the website
achievements: Successfully improved website's front-end elements and user experience

work.name: CV Mitrasoft Global
work.summary: Developed and migrated customer back office desktop applications to web platforms using Java Spring. Improved operational efficiency with new features and a more responsive interface.
highlights: Migrated desktop applications to web platforms
Improved operational efficiency with new features
achievements: Successfully migrated desktop applications to web platforms

education.description: Recommended as a Laboratory Assistant responsible for supporting practicals, and ability to work with teachers and students. Participated in the Certified Independent Study and Internship Program Batch 6. Contributed to and published a project work college journal on 'Decision Support System for Gastric Disease Diagnosis using Forward Chaining Method'.
Obtained Professional Certification Institute (LSP) Certificate, Software Development, and completed 23 competency units.

certificates.name: Kampus Merdeka MSIB Batch 6

certificates.description: Completed the Certified Independent Study and Internship Program (MSIB) Batch 6

certificates.name: Pemrograman Go-Lang : Pemula sampai Mahir
certificates.description: Completed course on Go-Lang programming from beginner to expert level

projects.name: Web Pemesanan Booking Ticket Movie
projects.description: Developed a movie ticket booking application using Vue JS 2, Vuetify, and MongoDB
highlights: Used Vue JS 2 for front-end development

projects.name: Web Zero Waste Massive
projects.description: Developed and created an API for a Service Ordering Application for Cleaning Service Personnel, using React and Express
highlights: Created service ordering system for cleaning personnel

projects.name: Sistem Pendukung Keputusan Kayawan Terbaik Menggunakan Metode SAW
projects.description: Created a Decision Support System Application using the SAW Method using Java programming language and MySQL to assist users in decision making in selecting the best employees
